recipe.title: Oysters on the Half Shell with Pernod Dipping Sauce
ingredients: 1/2 cup Champagne vinegar or white wine vinegar
instructions: Combine first 5 ingredients in medium bowl. Season to taste with salt and pepper. (Can be prepared 2 hours ahead. Cover and let stand at room temperature.)
Cover platter with crushed ice. Top with oysters. Place dipping sauce in center of platter. Serve immediately.
